about_text_top: I am Alex, I have been doing Frontend development for over 2 years. I take on projects of various levels of complexity. I am attracted by interesting tasks.
about_text_center: Frontend is a key part of my life, I take my work seriously and responsibly. I am equally good at working in a team and independently.
about_text_down: In my free time, I am sociable, I love nature and cycling.
